name: Aqualon
description: A serpent-like sea monster with the power to control ocean currents.

attack.name: Tidal Wave
attack.description: Summons a massive wall of pressurized water that crashes down on opponents with the force of a thousand tons, creating a widespread area of effect damage.

attack.name: Water Strike
attack.description: Launches precise jets of high-pressure water that can cut through solid rock, targeting multiple weak points simultaneously.

defense.name: Aqua Barrier
defense.description: Forms a spherical shield of dense water that absorbs kinetic energy and disperses elemental attacks through molecular redistribution.

defense.name: Surging Waters
defense.description: Creates a swirling vortex of water around the body that deflects incoming attacks and disorients nearby enemies with its powerful currents.

healing.name: Oceanic Recovery
healing.description: Harnesses the life-giving properties of water to restore health, purifying toxins and accelerating natural healing through hydration enhancement.
